landingpage.undertitel: Kammarslusen Ribe is a payment system for the ships in Ribe. It is a system that makes it easy for the ships to pay to pass through the lock, and it also makes it easy for the lock to keep track of which ships have paid and which have not.

termsofservice.title: Terms of Service
termsofservice.introduction: Welcome to Ribe Sailing Club's payment system. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms of service. Please read these terms carefully, as they contain important information about your rights and obligations.

section1.title: §1 Delivery
section1.content: When you make a purchase through our payment system, we will strive to deliver the purchased service as quickly as possible. In most cases, the delivery will take place within a few minutes after the purchase. In rare cases, however, delays may occur.

section2.title: §2 Refunds
section2.content: All sales are final, and we offer no refunds. If you have problems with your service, please contact our support team so we can help you.

section3.title: §3 Disclaimer of Liability
section3.content: Ribe Sailing Club and its payment system are provided 'as is' without any form of warranty, express or implied. We disclaim all liability for any damages or losses that may arise from the use of our services.

section4.title: §4 GDPR and Data Protection
section4.content: Ribe Sailing Club undertakes to protect your personal data and comply with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR. We only collect the necessary information to provide our services and will never share your information with third parties without your consent.

section5.title: §5 Changes to the Terms
section5.content: Ribe Sailing Club reserves the right to change these terms of service at any time. Any changes will be published on our website, and it is your responsibility to keep yourself updated on any changes.

section6.title: §6 Contact Information
section6.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms of service, please contact us at support@pins.dk.
